link.title: Roby CISD » iCal Feed

div.p: Dedicated resource page for all Roby CISD students and families.

div.class: et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_1 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty

div.p: UPDATE: Texas governor Greg Abbot has directed all public schools to close on-campus instruction until May 4 2020. This directive may be extended. With this directive in place, Roby CISD will continue to deploy our distance learning solutions until further notice.
Roby CISD will implement two distance learning delivery options for instruction: traditional, paper-based and a digital, online option.
This mode will allow teachers, students, and parents to remain in constant contact and feedback will be much quicker. Additionally, the content may have more variety than traditional paper-based.
Programs that will be utilized in the online option are as follows:

ul.li: Google Classroom will be the main location for most assignments as well as the location for assignments to be returned for grading. Additionally, the classroom will also have resources to help with assignments.
Seesaw is an app that turns any device with a camera into a turn-it-in machine. It will allow you to take pictures, video, and audio and turn it in as part of an assignment.

p.span: This mode of content and assignment delivery will be much more traditional in the sense that you will recieve paper based copies of your assignments, with instructions. You will complete the work and either return it to school by an approved method or you can use the Seesaw App to have it digitally delivered using a phone (recommended).

div.p: Students will receive their packets from their teachers by a method best fit for the individual student. Packets will be required to be worked through and the papers that are requied to be returned will need to turned back in by the mode agreed upon by the teacher and the parent/guardian.
One method some teachers may use will be the Seesaw app. Get with your teacher to understand the expectation and methods for delivery and return of packets and assignments.

div.p: Roby CISD will provide technical support for school-issued Chromebooks and programs that are being used by teachers during this closure. We will attempt to help with any programs we can.
